map-vis-geo-layer
directive in module npn-viz-tool

Description

Transfers any geojson features from the base map to the vis map based on GeoFilterArgs. This is strictly for visual effect. If such geofilter args are in play on then the filtered results will be used when placing in-situ data and as such markers will be similarly constrained.

Usage

as element:
<map-vis-geo-layer>
</map-vis-geo-layer>

Directive info

  • This directive creates new scope.
